title: Polo Bar
seo_description: Ralph Lauren's Polo Bar is the quintessential New York restaurant to feed your fixation on good fashion and a throwback to 90s food staples. Note: It's one of the hardest reservations in the city at the moment, so we suggest sitting at the bar for some classic shrimp cocktail or pigs in a blanket.
content:
Ralph's corned beef sandwich (melted swiss & horseradish coleslaw on marble rye)

1 E 55th St

walk: 8 minutes

Ralph Lauren's Polo Bar is the quintessential New York restaurant to feed your fixation on good fashion and a throwback to 90s food staples. Note: It's one of the hardest reservations in the city at the moment, so we suggest sitting at the bar for some classic shrimp cocktail or pigs in a blanket.
